original_text: When the letter arrived, these men took hold of the king's sons. They killed all 70 of them. They put their heads in baskets. Then they sent them to Jehu in Jezreel.
korean_text: 편지가 그들에게 이르매 그들이 왕자 칠십 명을 붙잡아 죽이고 그들의 머리를 광주리에 담아 이스르엘 예후에게로 보내니라

sentences.original_text: these men took hold of the king's sons
They put their heads in baskets
Then they sent them to Jehu in Jezreel
